quotes.quote: I'm an idealist. I don't know where I'm going, but I'm on my way.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Idealism is what precedes experience; cynicism is what follows.
quotes.author: David T. Wolf

quotes.quote: An idealist is one who, on noticing that a rose smells better than a cabbage, concludes that it will also make better soup.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: An idealist is a person who helps other people to be prosperous.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When they come downstairs from their Ivory Towers, Idealists are very apt to walk straight into the gutter.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Cynics regarded everybody as equally corrupt... Idealists regarded everybody as equally corrupt, except themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson
